id: Chad Hugo Shares How Ol' Dirty Bastard Made "Got Your Money"
paragraph: This week on Noisey Radio, Dallas' 10k talks creating "The Whoa" dance, working with Lil Yachty and Lil Uzi Vert, and drops off a world premiere. Then, Chad Hugo of the N.E.R.D. takes us through his legendary career. Plus, French electronic icons Justice are in the house to play brand new music.Listen here at 11 AM EST/8AM PST and 11 PM EST/8 PM PST. IntroLil Peep - "Cry Alone"10k10k - "She Got Swagg"10k - "Dip Swag Dip"10k - "Stunna Shades" feat. Lil Yachty & G.U.N10k - "Jet Lyfe" feat. Slim Jxmmi & G.U.N *World Premiere* Chad Hugo N.E.R.D. - "Rockstar"Kelis & Ol' Dirty Bastard - "Got Your Money"N.E.R.D. - "Lapdance"N.E.R.D. - "Lemon" JusticeJustice - "Love S.O.S."Justice - "D.A.N.C.E."
